about_the_game:
In this RPG set in the Medieval-Renaissance era of the 1530s, you are a being named Phantom Scott, who after a turn of events in his childhood, vows to destroy the world he has created. It's up to you to decide which path to take for him...

This game is an expanded version (well, pretty much the full game) of the prototype build released in November 2022! You do not have to play the prototype version to enjoy this game.

Features:

-Original art and soundtrack! Exactly what it says on the tin!

-A demo exclusive boss! Some things are only exclusive to a shorter version...

-Virtual Pet Menu! Take care of Phantom Scott, but check this menu throughout your journey, as each of its two meters reaching 0 can lead to consequences...

-Unique Battle System! Shows you where you're from and where your opponent currently is during each turn!

-Up to 3 different endings! The choices you make and how much you collect determines what lies at the end of each route...

-Collectable items! Collect scrolls throughout your journey and learn more about the being that is Phantom Scott... What really is he? He certainly isn't human like he appears...
